youtube.title: Development of the Human Heart: 0 to 70 Days Animation
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating stages of human heart development in this detailed 3D animation. We trace the journey from endocardial tubes at 20 days to a fully formed heart by day 70, including the formation of the primitive heart tube, ventricles, and aorta.
